4742157/4740789/4781235.title: Local Cures - Sciatica
4742157/4740789/4781235.text:
1.  Beat the affected spot with nettles (Mrs Aherne, Celbridge, heard ditto from workman)



2. Get a bunch of nettles sting the affected part severe until it gets red and blisters the poison of the nettle will cure it

4922210/4860883/5015983.title: Home Cures - Anthony's Fire or Wild Fire
4922210/4860883/5015983.text:
Anthony's Fire or Wild FireThe blood of a person names Cahill whose father and mother were both Cahill cures Anthony's Fire. A piece of thread or string is tied lightly round fingers, and the finger is then pricked with a needle. The blood is rubbed to the affected part.



SciaticaTurpentine to be taken in the following manner - Begin with one drop the first day, two drops the second, three drops the third and increasing the amount taken by one drop daily. Continue for 21 days. Then reduce the amount taken daily by one drop each day till you come back to one drop. The whole course runs over a period of 41 days



Styes1. Make the sign of the cross with a gold wedding ring over the affected eye three times in succession, saying each time ''In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost''
(continues on next page)

5008822/4959109/5072720.title: Sciatica
5008822/4959109/5072720.text: A man at Duffy's Cross makes the cure with a basin of water and seven pebbles. He has died lately, but passed on the cure to his sister. The son of a local doctor was a very bad case but was cured after nine visits.

5044849/5044030/5087232.title: Cures - Sciatica
5044849/5044030/5087232.text:
Sciatica . A small raw potato put in cloth & tied round the neck. If constantly worn either this way or in pocket in shirt no trace of pain is felt.A cure given & believed in by Thomas Smith Corroneary.



Cure of severe bleeding from cut or other wound. Bleeding ceases curer blesses himself waves his hand towards bleeding & says three times " A child born in BethlehemAnd washed in river JordanAnd as Christ says you shallStop this blood"Given by Mick Donohoe Tullycoe Also had by Mick Gallagher Larah.



SprainThe patient blesses himself also the curer who rubs the affected part between his hands then he (curer) repeats these words silentlyAs Jesus rode on His ass's colt, His ass's colts foot slipped. He got down
(continues on next page)

5070813/5066564/5098154.title: Local Cures - Sciatica
5070813/5066564/5098154.text: Local Cures - SciaticaThere lives a woman of the widow Duffy's cross, . . . , who is supposed to have the cure for Sciatica.People going to her must have great faith in what she tells them to do and must also repeat her prayers. They also must attend a certain number of times to be cured.This woman has only the cure for the last five years when it was given to her by some relation at his death.People say she can leave it to anyone at her death also.Ruby Shekleton

5009044/4980327/5118436.text:

name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost.



The person who has the cure, comes to the house, and there are three ribs of hair on top of the head, and if he gets these ribs and pull them up straight, the pallet is then supposed to be lifted.



Sciatica pains can be cured  by water from a river that divides two counties. It must be lifted between sun set and sun rise. The person must go three different days for the water.



The cure of the whooping cough is to find out where there are two of the one name married. Go there and partake of some of the bread they are eating.
